content:
I just tested the :contains modifier on our HAPI 2.0 JPA Example server:
https://fhir.gecko.hs-heilbronn.de/
It doesn't seem to work, neither with name:contains or family:contains or given:contains. The behaviour is the same like without a modifier.
( the :exact modifier is working)
Is this a known bug? couldn't find an issue on github

we've upgraded to hapi 2.1 JPA Example server, problem persists i opened a github issue:
https://github.com/jamesagnew/hapi-fhir/issues/512
Hi @Patrick Werner , The JPA server actually hasn't yet implemented the :contains modifier. I'd be happy if you could file a github issue, we should definitely implement this.
Oops, I see an issue has already been filed. :)
